dataStudio.name: Kaggle
dataStudio.description: Connect to and visualize Kaggle datasets. This connector supports a single CSV file up to 20MB size for each data source. Add the connector multiple times for multiple data sources. Steps to get your Kaggle API key: https://www.kaggle.com/docs/api#getting-started-installation-&-authentication. Use the deployment link: https://datastudio.google.com/u/0/datasources/create?connectorId=AKfycbz8N8nRisgB6Xi7Z-HP70vuWfz4nQ378CQaOwE_tTs1Sn6Avq_AiDaB0DqqfXFxIaHxpA to test the functionality of the connector.
